dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Shariyah Review Bureau in Saudi Arabia, that's a serious name to have on your compliance certificate, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shariyah Review Bureau in Saudi Arabia, that's a serious name to have on your compliance certificate, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Compliance with the principles of Islamic finance is confirmed by the international Shariah Board Shariyah Review Bureau (Saudi Arabia), as well as the Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh absolutely. And it took them over two years to get that endorsement, which just shows you how rigorous their due diligence process was.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh absolutely. And it took them over two years to get that endorsement, which just shows you how rigorous their due diligence process was.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So this Tayyab card, it's not just Sharia-compliant in theory—it actually avoids generating interest altogether, no fees on balances.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this Tayyab card, it's not just Sharia-compliant in theory-it actually avoids generating interest altogether, no fees on balances.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Customer card balances are not used to generate interest income, and interest is not charged on them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and you can issue it instantly through their mobile app, which apparently got so popular at launch that their servers couldn't even handle the demand at first.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and you can issue it instantly through their mobile app, which apparently got so popular at launch that their servers couldn't even handle the demand at first.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I heard that! And they've got this global delivery for the plastic VISA card too, hand-delivered anywhere in the world within five business days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I heard that! And they've got this global delivery for the plastic V I S A card too, hand-delivered anywhere in the world within five business days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, you can store money in four currencies—KZT, USD, EUR, RUB—and withdraw cash at any ATM worldwide, which is pretty huge for travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, you can store money in four currencies-K Z T, U S D, E U R, R U B-and withdraw cash at any A T M worldwide, which is pretty huge for travelers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can store money in four currencies Kazakhstan KZT, USD, EUR, RUB, and you can withdraw cash at any ATM in the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the app itself is like a whole lifestyle toolkit—prayer times, Qibla compass, even a Zakat calculator. Daniyar Uspanov, their CEO, really emphasized that integration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the app itself is like a whole lifestyle toolkit-prayer times, Qibla compass, even a Zakat calculator. Daniyar Uspanov, their C E O, really emphasized that integration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The application also has prayer times and Azan, Qibla compass, Zikr counter, Zakat calculator and much more notes Daniyar Uspanov, Tayyab CEO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it's not just functional—it's restrictive in a purposeful way. Like, you can't use it at casinos or bars, but grocery stores are fine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it's not just functional-it's restrictive in a purposeful way. Like, you can't use it at casinos or bars, but grocery stores are fine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additional features of Tayyab first digital Islamic card are that it is not intended for payment in casinos, as well as in any gambling and lottery establishments, specialized stores selling alcohol and tobacco products, while the restriction does not apply to department stores selling groceries. The card is not intended to pay for goods and services in bars and nightclubs, and the restriction does not apply to restaurants and cafes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They timed the launch with Eid al-Adha this year, July 20th, and had a bunch of Islamic scholars promoting it. Smart move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They timed the launch with Eid al-Adha this year, July twentieth, and had a bunch of Islamic scholars promoting it. Smart move.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And with backing from Dubai Fintech Ventures and Brunei's Sovereign Wealth Fund, you know this isn't some small experimental project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with backing from Dubai Fintech Ventures and Brunei's Sovereign Wealth Fund, you know this isn't some small experimental project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely feels like they're bridging modern fintech with faith-based needs in a way that's been missing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely feels like they're bridging modern fintech with faith-based needs in a way that's been missing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. If you're looking, the app's on Apple Store and Play Market—Tayyab, all one word.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. If you're looking, the app's on Apple Store and Play Market-Tayyab, all one word.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can download the Tayyab application and issue a card on the Apple store for iPhone and Play market for Android smartphones, and for more information, visit www.tayyab.kz
